code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Subject=()=>{const[subjects,setSubjects]=useState([]);const[newSubject,setNewSubject]=useState('');const addSubject=()=>{if(newSubject){setSubjects([...subjects,newSubject]);setNewSubject('');}else{alert('Please enter full information');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Subject"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-4 mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Subject",value:newSubject,onChange:e=>setNewSubject(e.target.value),className:"p-2 border rounded flex-1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addSubject,className:"bg-green-500 text-white p-2 rounded hover:bg-green-600",children:"Add subject"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc pl-6",children:subjects.map((subject,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:subject},index))})]});};export default Subject;
